works.description: The content from our WordPress hosting page is being used on another site:  "WordPress is extremely intuitive, so it's a great content management system (CMS) for beginners. WordPress first got its start as a blogging platform, and many people still mistakenly believe it cannot be used as a CMS. However, WordPress has grown so much over the past few years, that tons of people are using it to create simple blogs, professional websites, and even online stores!"
